description: A publicly-accessible digital ledger used to store and transfer information without the need for a central authority. Blockchains are the core technology on which cryptocurrency protocols like Bitcoin and Ethereum are built.
An acronym for hold on for dear life
An acronym for fear, uncertainty, doom
An acronym for fear of missing out
A term used to refer to a government issued currency like the US Dollar
A term for an individual holding a large amount of cryptocurrency
